summary:
• FY26 Guidance Reaffirmed:
  • Total income: $115m-$123m
  • Total spend: $127m-$133m

  • Note: Guidance unchanged from 20 May 2025 announcement.

  • North American Expansion:

  • GetThere acquisition and Sabre partnership provide in-market foothold; focus on scaling US enterprise customers.

  • Platform Investment:

  • $40m accelerated investment in platform modernization (AI, automation, multi-tenant architecture) to support growth.

  • Cash Flow:

  • Pre-acquisition business generated positive Free Cash Flow of $7.4m in FY25; supports US expansion and platform investments.

  • Group Free Cash Flow improved to $(1.9)m (vs. $(7.1)m in FY24).

  • Key Risks:

  • Macroeconomic/geopolitical uncertainties (e.g., Middle East conflict) flagged as potential impacts.

No material capital markets actions (e.g., capital raises, trading halts) identified.
